1.content: so here we are time to pick and era to affect.
1.title: time to start

11.content: into the past I see, well this should be fun now, lets pick the saga ready?
11.title: dragon ball

12.content: AH! yes the main show now all :king kIa: jokes aside lets pick the saga
12.title: dragon ball z

13.content: wonderful on to the third version now the sagas
13.title: dragon ball gt

131.content: An interesting choice. Who will you encounter?
131.title: black star saga

14.content: and the newest SUPER ... sorry went frankie there for a moment but the current sagas
14.title: dragon ball super

15.content: ooh! nice the what if saga, full of what ifs. What if goku what a female, what if goku married Bulma, what if it was radizs sent to earth first. but I am getting ahead of my self. Now tell me your what if and we will see what happens, but always leave a "what if: option for others fairs fair.
15.title: dragon ball what if

choices: Goku is still a toddler learning from Gine and his adopted Grandpa, Gohan.
Goku is at his teenage phase.
We're to the Dragon Ball Z era, Gine's a grandmother to Gohan II.
Let's try another what if time with mother/grandmother Gine.
151.content:
Ah, so Gine, Saiyan blood mother of Goku/Kakarot, and Raddits.

So at the time Planet Vegeta was going to be destroyed, while Bardok, her husband refused to escape off planet, Gine flies off with Kakarot to Earth.

Now here's the question. At what point in time does this Unbirth story take place?
151.title: Gine escapes with her son Goku/Kakarot

choices: Vegeta has turned good. After the events of Freeza's defeat.
Let's try another point in time in this what if.
1514.content: So, Gine's still in the picture, It's past the time her grandson Gohan II was born. But how far we talking here?
1514.title: Gine's in the story, but when?

choices: Future Trunks has arrived, before baby Trunks is born.
Trunks is born and the Androids have arrived. Future Trunks is back.
Cell is defeated. Goku is passed away. Android 18 is good.
Let's try even further in this what if scenario.
15144.content: Okay, so it's past the point Vegeta has turned from bad to good? But how far?
15144.title: Gine's part of further events.

choices: Reader's choice. Can't really reach past GT era with Gine.
151444.content: Okay. So Gine has been part of the Events past the Cell Games. But what point are we at now?
151444.title: Gine's still around.

choices: Always Good Girl Android 18. She's fierce, but she's good.
152.content:
So, in this scenario, Android 18, from the time she was built by the crazy doctor, something in her programming made her good instead of bad, and she sided with the Goku and company, altering the future events to come after her reveal. And being android, she can carry a baby far past normal full term pregnancy.

Shall we try this, or another "What if"?
152.title: Always Good Android 18?

info.brief_description: what happens when a strange power affects the Z warriors through the years
info.description:
today I bring you and story based on all the Dragon Balls the only question is how will this play out


the rules are easy no killing and no Mpreg

the story is mostly unbirth.... However! the kai's will allow vore, cock vore, age regression and normal pregnancy as long as the former reforms in a male or female.

with that lets have fun with all the worlds now
